div.p: 1. Date Code and Shelf Life: All the deliverables shall be newly manufactured or a minimum of 90% of the shelf life should be remaining at the time of shipment. Material LOT code no. and Batch code no. should be mentioned in the Shipping Invoice.

p.span: The deliverables will be accepted based on In-house sampling inspection and upon receipt of applicable documents. In case of any deviation in quality, our QA may reject items. A rejection note with incoming QA findings will be shared electronically with an intimation to arrange for rejected material pick up. All expenses will be borne by the Seller for this.

div.p: 3. Packing and Shipping: Pricing is inclusive of packaging or storage unless otherwise agreed in writing by the buyer. Buyer's order numbers must be marked on all packages and shipping documents. Seller shall not ship in advance of schedule or make partial shipment unless otherwise agreed in writing by the buyer. Packing should be such that material is protected from Indentation, scratch or any kind of damage during transportation & unloading.

4. Warranty: Seller warrants that all deliverables will conform to applicable specifications, drawings, descriptions, and samples. All the deliverables will carry a warranty of 12 months from the date of receipt unless otherwise specified in the order. If the deliverables delivered under this purchase order fails under warranty, the Buyer may return at Seller's expense. The defective or nonconforming products to be corrected or replaced by the Seller at no cost to the buyer.

5. Default: Buyer may, by written notice to Seller, cancel this purchase order for default, (a) if Seller fails to deliver the deliverables strictly within the time specified in this purchase order, or if no time is specified, within a reasonable limit. (b) if the deliverables delivered do not conform to this purchase order or if Seller fails to perform any of the other provisions of this purchase order, or so fails to make progress as to endanger performance of this purchase order in accordance with its terms. Upon such cancellation, Buyer shall not be liable to Seller for any amount.

6. Confidential Information: Seller shall not disclose to any third party or use any confidential information of Buyer's concerning this purchase order or other material intended for use in connection with this purchase order without prior written consent.
7. Price: All prices are firm and fixed for the entire quantity and duration of the Purchase Order.
8. Jurisdiction: This Purchase Order is subjected to Ahmadabad-Gujarat Jurisdiction only.

ol.li: Pricing: The pricing stated is Ex-works, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, reflecting our competitive rates for the products and services offered.

Taxes: All prices indicated are exclusive of taxes. An additional 18% tax will be applicable, as specified in the calculation, in accordance with the prevailing tax regulations.
Payment Terms: To proceed with the order, we kindly request full payment in advance. This helps streamline the process and ensures prompt delivery of your requested products and services.
Mode of Dispatch: For efficient and reliable transportation, we utilize a trusted network of standard courier services that align with industry best practices.

Warranty: Our products are accompanied by a comprehensive one-year warranty. However, it is important to note that the warranty does not cover damages resulting from improper handling or usage beyond recommended guidelines.

Delivery Time: The delivery time mentioned in this quotation pertains to the dispatch from our premises. Please be aware that the duration required for safe transportation is excluded and subject to potential changes based on logistical considerations.

Delivery Schedule: Delivery will be scheduled based on the availability of stock at the time of order placement. Our team will promptly communicate any deviations or adjustments to the estimated delivery timeline.

Delivery Time Deviations: While our dedicated team is committed to ensuring timely delivery of your orders, it is important to acknowledge that unforeseen circumstances and external factors beyond our direct control can occasionally impact logistics. Consequently, we cannot accept liability or claims for minor deviations from the stated delivery schedule.

Order Placement: We kindly request that all orders be addressed exclusively to Mech Power Technology Private Limited. This ensures accurate processing and enables us to provide you with the utmost attention and service.
